span.cn: 为选定的属性产生弹性，包括普通的数字属性，或者路径属性。
span.en: Create flexibility for selected attributes, including common numeric attributes, or path attributes.

span.cn: 路径反弹以及回弹，都支持平滑到下一关键帧
span.en: Release scripts to support the rebound and rebound of paths and digital    attributes;    when    the path rebounds, it supports smoothing to the next key frame

span.cn: 发布脚本，支持路径和数字属性的回弹和回弹； 路径回弹时，支持平滑到下一关键帧
span.en: Release scripts to support the rebound and rebound of paths and digital    attributes;    when    the path rebounds, it supports smoothing to the next key frame
